column4: Anybody know why nautalis can't mount my Win XP NTFS partition? I get the error "error: device /dev/hda1 is not removable" "error: could not execute pmount"
Anybody know why nautalis can't mount my Win XP NTFS partition? I get the error "error: device /dev/hda1 is not removable" "error: could not execute pmount"
are you able to run windows?
tried mounting from the command promtp? sudo mount /dev/sdb# some/folder ?
pmount.allow has no enties except for the #... comments at the top
/dev/hda1. sorry  i thought you had a scsci drive
sweet work fine now! should add that info to the documentation
